text:
Paystand | Guadalajara, Mexico | Onsite | paystand.com

We are hiring Sr. FrontEnd, Backend, Full Stack and DevOps Engineers for our just opened Guadalajara Office.

We are a small startup (~25 people in Santra Cruz, 3 in Guadalajara) that just got is Series A (6 mil last November) and are expanding our Engineering team here in Guadalajara.

If you would like to know more, drop me a line at b2JhcXVlaXJvQHBheXN0YW5kLmNvbQ==

We are also hiring for DevOps for the Santa Cruz office! Must be onsite at this time. You can see all our opening on LinkedIn ( https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search/?keywords=paystand ).
